issue.title: feat(module:dropdown): improve `NzContextMenuService`
issue.body:
## PR Checklist
Please check if your PR fulfills the following requirements:

- [x] The commit message follows our guidelines: https://github.com/NG-ZORRO/ng-zorro-antd/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md#commit
- [ ] Tests for the changes have been added (for bug fixes / features)
- [x] Docs have been added / updated (for bug fixes / features)


## PR Type
What kind of change does this PR introduce?

<!-- Please check the one that applies to this PR using "x". -->
```
[ ] Bugfix
[x] Feature
[ ] Code style update (formatting, local variables)
[ ] Refactoring (no functional changes, no api changes)
[ ] Build related changes
[ ] CI related changes
[ ] Documentation content changes
[ ] Application (the showcase website) / infrastructure changes
[ ] Other... Please describe:
```

## What is the current behavior?
<!-- Please describe the current behavior that you are modifying, or link to a relevant issue. -->

Issue Number: N/A

- `NzContextMenuService` is provided at the `NzContextMenuServiceModule`, this results in the inability to enjoy the benefits of tree shaking.
- `NzContextMenuService#create()` return `void`，developer cannot listen to view destroy event.

## What is the new behavior?

- `NzContextMenuService` is now provided at the root, this will remove unused services using tree-shaking.
- `NzContextMenuService#create()` will now return `EmbeddedViewRef`, developers can listen to view destroy event through `EmbeddedViewRef#onDestroy()`.

## Does this PR introduce a breaking change?
```
[ ] Yes
[x] No
```

<!-- If this PR contains a breaking change, please describe the impact and migration path for existing applications below. -->


## Other information

issue.title: fix(list): specify template ref context on input to match instantiation
issue.body:
## PR Checklist
Please check if your PR fulfills the following requirements:

- [ ] The commit message follows our guidelines: https://github.com/NG-ZORRO/ng-zorro-antd/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md#commit
- [ ] Tests for the changes have been added (for bug fixes / features)
- [ ] Docs have been added / updated (for bug fixes / features)


## PR Type
What kind of change does this PR introduce?

<!-- Please check the one that applies to this PR using "x". -->
```
[x] Bugfix
[ ] Feature
[ ] Code style update (formatting, local variables)
[ ] Refactoring (no functional changes, no api changes)
[ ] Build related changes
[ ] CI related changes
[ ] Documentation content changes
[ ] Application (the showcase website) / infrastructure changes
[ ] Other... Please describe:
```

## What is the current behavior?
<!-- Please describe the current behavior that you are modifying, or link to a relevant issue. -->
Currently input `nzRenderItem` on NzList component is defined as `TemplateRef<void>` but it is instantiated with a context.

It works in current version to pass in a template, which relies on a provided context. Unfortunately template refs and their context are not type checked by Angular. So you can pass in a TemplateRef with context even if a TemplateRef without context is expected by the input. And ng-zorro can provide a context during the instantiation even if the TemplateRef is specified without context.

Issue Number: N/A


## What is the new behavior?

Input `nzRenderItem` on NzList component is now defined as `TemplateRef<{ $implicit: NzSafeAny, index: number}>`, the same context type as the template is providing.

## Does this PR introduce a breaking change?
```
[ ] Yes
[x] No
```

<!-- If this PR contains a breaking change, please describe the impact and migration path for existing applications below. -->


## Other information

issue.title: 希望继承自NzTooltipBaseDirective的气泡提供一个全局销毁接口
issue.body:
## What problem does this feature solve?
路由复用的时候(比如alain的路由复用标签)，如果如果在tooltip/popover打开的情况下，触发了跳转页面，这个时候tooltip的宿主元素被缓存了，tooltip却没有关闭，就会导致跳转了页面，上一个页面的tooltip还停留在页面上

## What does the proposed API look like?
如果可以像NzModalService.closeAll()那样，那就只需要监听router.events就可以全局的解决这个问题了。<!-- generated by ng-zorro-issue-helper. DO NOT REMOVE -->

comment.body:
Translation of this issue:
---
## Hope to inherit a global destruction interface from NZTooltipbaseDirective

## What PROBLEM DOES This Feature Solve?
When reuse of routes (such as Alain's routing label), if the jump page is triggered when the ToolTip/Popover is opened, the host element of Tooltip is cached at this time, but Tooltip is not closed, which will lead Turn to the page, the Tooltip on the previous page is still on the page

## What does the proposed api look like?
If it can be like nzmodalService.closeall (), you only need to monitor Router.events to solve this problem global.

issue.title: 希望给Message全局提示加上一个手动关闭的按钮
issue.body:
## What problem does this feature solve?
在查看错误信息的时候，需要长时间的观看，增加一个关闭按钮就能够看完信息后手动关闭

## What does the proposed API look like?
showClose<!-- generated by ng-zorro-issue-helper. DO NOT REMOVE -->

comment.body:
Translation of this issue:
---
## Hope to add a manual closure button to the MESSAGE global prompt

## What PROBLEM DOES This Feature Solve?
When viewing the error message, you need to watch it for a long time. Add a closing button to read it manually after reading the information

## What does the proposed api look like?
showclose

issue.title: 希望NzImagePreviewOptions 增加自定义样式支持
issue.body:
## What problem does this feature solve?
NzImagePreview 有时我们不想全屏预览图片，希望能左边停靠或右边停靠预览图片，预览组件宽度可以自定义。

## What does the proposed API look like?
希望可以在NzImagePreviewOptions 增加自定义样式支持，或增加左/右停靠和预览组件宽度自定义配置。<!-- generated by ng-zorro-issue-helper. DO NOT REMOVE -->

comment.body:
Translation of this issue:
---
## Hope NZIMAGEPREVIEPTIONS will add custom style support

## What PROBLEM DOES This Feature Solve?
NZIMAGEPREVIEW sometimes does not want to preview the picture in full screen. I hope that the left side can be stopped or on the right. The width of the preview component can be customized.

## What does the proposed api look like?
It is hoped that you can add custom style support at NZIMAGEPREVIEPTIONS, or add left/right stop and preview component width custom configuration.

issue.title: Switch开关、Modal对话框在360极速浏览器样式异常
issue.body:
### Reproduction link
[https://angular-qpezqw.stackblitz.io](https://angular-qpezqw.stackblitz.io)

### Steps to reproduce
Switch开关、Modal对话框在360极速浏览器样式异常，
switch开关仅显示个颜色块
modal弹出在浏览器左上角

### What is expected?
正常显示

### What is actually happening?
样式异常。

| Environment | Info |
|---|---|
| ng-zorro-antd | 14.1.1 |
| Browser | 360极速浏览器13.5.2 |

---
Angular 13.2.1 与 ng-zorro 13.x 显示正常，新版显示异常，刚升级，就看到这两个，赶紧撤回更新了；另外我一个项目存在本地编辑，页面不断刷新N多次后才停止，不晓得什么问题。<!-- generated by ng-zorro-issue-helper. DO NOT REMOVE -->

comment.body:
Translation of this issue:
---
## SWITCH switch, MODAL dialog box is abnormal in 360 speed browser style

### STEPS To Reproduce
The Switch switch, the MODAL dialog box is abnormal in the 360 ​​speed browser style,
Switch switch only shows a color block
Modal pops up in the upper left corner of the browser

normal display

### What is actually happy?
Style is abnormal.

---
Angular 13.2.1 and NG-Zorro 13.x are normal. The new version shows abnormalities. Just after upgrading, I saw these two and quickly withdrew the update. In addition I don't know anything.

issue.body:

## PR Type
What kind of change does this PR introduce?
The table component could not calculate the correct colgroup width when using colspan.
![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/31619017/193493837-66047bd7-1035-4880-861a-0e915595952a.png)
> the list of col width should be ['150px', '150px', '150px', '150px', '150px', '150px', '150px'], but now is [null, null, null, null].
> The table column width should add width to each column after splitting, so there should be 7 cols here. Due to logic problems, the wrong column width array is used here, and colspan is ignored

issue.title: Why doesn't nz-input-number use type number
issue.body:
### Discussed in https://github.com/NG-ZORRO/ng-zorro-antd/discussions/7655
Originally posted by **saif317** September 30, 2022 in the input-number.component.ts file, this is how the input element is defined: ```
``` the type of the input element is not defined so it's defaulting to text, this allows the user to input non-numeric characters into the field, ng zorro handles that by removing non-numeric characters from the field, but why not use the default behavior of not allowing the user to input non-numeric character at all. any specific reason why the component was designed this way?

issue.title: fix(module:table): fix vertical scroll bar in table header and wrong listOfColWidth caused by th width colspan
issue.body:
## PR Checklist
Please check if your PR fulfills the following requirements:

- [x] The commit message follows our guidelines: https://github.com/NG-ZORRO/ng-zorro-antd/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md#commit
- [x] Tests for the changes have been added (for bug fixes / features)
- [ ] Docs have been added / updated (for bug fixes / features)


## PR Type
What kind of change does this PR introduce?

<!-- Please check the one that applies to this PR using "x". -->
```
[x] Bugfix
[ ] Feature
[ ] Code style update (formatting, local variables)
[ ] Refactoring (no functional changes, no api changes)
[ ] Build related changes
[ ] CI related changes
[ ] Documentation content changes
[ ] Application (the showcase website) / infrastructure changes
[ ] Other... Please describe:
```

## What is the current behavior?
In the past, if there was a header grouping, the table could not calculate the correct column width;
![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/31619017/193493837-66047bd7-1035-4880-861a-0e915595952a.png)
> the listOfColWidth should be ['150px', '150px', '150px', '150px', '150px', '150px', '150px'], but now is [null, null, null, null].

The table component of ng-zorro used to display a vertical scroll bar in the header, and modified its scroll bar style under webkit to achieve a similar display effect to Ant Design React, but this implementation uses styles that are only valid under webkit, Not compatible with firefox.

Issue Number: #7656 


## What is the new behavior?

After this modification, when the table has vertical scrolling, the header will add a scroll bar cell with the same width as the scroll bar of the table body in the last column of the first row and the last column of the table header like Ant Design React. If the column is fixed on the right, then this column is also fixed at the same time, and the corresponding right style is set for the other fixed columns on the right.

## Does this PR introduce a breaking change?
```
[ ] Yes
[x] No
```

## Other information
no

navigate with `await router.navigate(...)` to a new position and add update tabs bounded to the `nz-tab`, active tab not updated

navigate with `await router.navigate(...)` to a new position and add update tabs bounded to the `nz-tab`, active tab will be updated

[ ] Yes
[x] No
```

## Other information
The example above may look meaningless, however, there is a condition that a link tab is guarded by a feature flag, and so the tab can only be added after the route navigated, in this case, selected tab won't update properly

Issue Number: N/A

- `NzContextMenuService` is provided at the `NzContextMenuServiceModule`, this results in the inability to enjoy the benefits of tree shaking.
- `NzContextMenuService#create()` return `void`，developer cannot listen to view destroy event.

## What is the new behavior?

- `NzContextMenuService` is now provided at the root, this will remove unused services using tree-shaking.
- `NzContextMenuService#create()` will now return `EmbeddedViewRef`, developers can listen to view destroy event through `EmbeddedViewRef#onDestroy()`.

issue.title: fix(list): specify template ref context on input to match instantiation
issue.body:
## PR Checklist
Please check if your PR fulfills the following requirements:

- [ ] The commit message follows our guidelines: https://github.com/NG-ZORRO/ng-zorro-antd/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md#commit
- [ ] Tests for the changes have been added (for bug fixes / features)
- [ ] Docs have been added / updated (for bug fixes / features)


## PR Type
What kind of change does this PR introduce?

<!-- Please check the one that applies to this PR using "x". -->
```
[x] Bugfix
[ ] Feature
[ ] Code style update (formatting, local variables)
[ ] Refactoring (no functional changes, no api changes)
[ ] Build related changes
[ ] CI related changes
[ ] Documentation content changes
[ ] Application (the showcase website) / infrastructure changes
[ ] Other... Please describe:
```

## What is the current behavior?
<!-- Please describe the current behavior that you are modifying, or link to a relevant issue. -->
Currently input `nzRenderItem` on NzList component is defined as `TemplateRef<void>` but it is instantiated with a context.

It works in current version to pass in a template, which relies on a provided context. Unfortunately template refs and their context are not type checked by Angular. So you can pass in a TemplateRef with context even if a TemplateRef without context is expected by the input. And ng-zorro can provide a context during the instantiation even if the TemplateRef is specified without context.

Issue Number: N/A


## What is the new behavior?

Input `nzRenderItem` on NzList component is now defined as `TemplateRef<{ $implicit: NzSafeAny, index: number}>`, the same context type as the template is providing.

## Does this PR introduce a breaking change?
```
[ ] Yes
[x] No
```

<!-- If this PR contains a breaking change, please describe the impact and migration path for existing applications below. -->


## Other information

issue.title: 希望继承自NzTooltipBaseDirective的气泡提供一个全局销毁接口
issue.body:
## What problem does this feature solve?
路由复用的时候(比如alain的路由复用标签)，如果如果在tooltip/popover打开的情况下，触发了跳转页面，这个时候tooltip的宿主元素被缓存了，tooltip却没有关闭，就会导致跳转了页面，上一个页面的tooltip还停留在页面上

## What does the proposed API look like?
如果可以像NzModalService.closeAll()那样，那就只需要监听router.events就可以全局的解决这个问题了。<!-- generated by ng-zorro-issue-helper. DO NOT REMOVE -->

comment.body:
Translation of this issue:
---
## Hope to inherit a global destruction interface from NZTooltipbaseDirective

## What PROBLEM DOES This Feature Solve?
When reuse of routes (such as Alain's routing label), if the jump page is triggered when the ToolTip/Popover is opened, the host element of Tooltip is cached at this time, but Tooltip is not closed, which will lead Turn to the page, the Tooltip on the previous page is still on the page

## What does the proposed api look like?
If it can be like nzmodalService.closeall (), you only need to monitor Router.events to solve this problem global.

issue.title: 希望给Message全局提示加上一个手动关闭的按钮
issue.body:
## What problem does this feature solve?
在查看错误信息的时候，需要长时间的观看，增加一个关闭按钮就能够看完信息后手动关闭

## What does the proposed API look like?
showClose<!-- generated by ng-zorro-issue-helper. DO NOT REMOVE -->

comment.body:
Translation of this issue:
---
## Hope to add a manual closure button to the MESSAGE global prompt

## What PROBLEM DOES This Feature Solve?
When viewing the error message, you need to watch it for a long time. Add a closing button to read it manually after reading the information

## What does the proposed api look like?
showclose

issue.title: 希望NzImagePreviewOptions 增加自定义样式支持
issue.body:
## What problem does this feature solve?
NzImagePreview 有时我们不想全屏预览图片，希望能左边停靠或右边停靠预览图片，预览组件宽度可以自定义。

## What does the proposed API look like?
希望可以在NzImagePreviewOptions 增加自定义样式支持，或增加左/右停靠和预览组件宽度自定义配置。<!-- generated by ng-zorro-issue-helper. DO NOT REMOVE -->

comment.body:
Translation of this issue:
---
## Hope NZIMAGEPREVIEPTIONS will add custom style support

## What PROBLEM DOES This Feature Solve?
NZIMAGEPREVIEW sometimes does not want to preview the picture in full screen. I hope that the left side can be stopped or on the right. The width of the preview component can be customized.

## What does the proposed api look like?
It is hoped that you can add custom style support at NZIMAGEPREVIEPTIONS, or add left/right stop and preview component width custom configuration.

issue.title: Switch开关、Modal对话框在360极速浏览器样式异常
issue.body:
### Reproduction link
[https://angular-qpezqw.stackblitz.io](https://angular-qpezqw.stackblitz.io)

### Steps to reproduce
Switch开关、Modal对话框在360极速浏览器样式异常，
switch开关仅显示个颜色块
modal弹出在浏览器左上角

### What is expected?
正常显示

### What is actually happening?
样式异常。

| Environment | Info |
|---|---|
| ng-zorro-antd | 14.1.1 |
| Browser | 360极速浏览器13.5.2 |

---
Angular 13.2.1 与 ng-zorro 13.x 显示正常，新版显示异常，刚升级，就看到这两个，赶紧撤回更新了；另外我一个项目存在本地编辑，页面不断刷新N多次后才停止，不晓得什么问题。<!-- generated by ng-zorro-issue-helper. DO NOT REMOVE -->

comment.body:
Translation of this issue:
---
## SWITCH switch, MODAL dialog box is abnormal in 360 speed browser style

### REPRODUCTION LINK
[https://angular-qpezqw.stackblitz.io] (https://angular-qpezqw.stackblitz.io))

### STEPS To Reproduce
The Switch switch, the MODAL dialog box is abnormal in the 360 ​​speed browser style,
Switch switch only shows a color block
Modal pops up in the upper left corner of the browser

### What is exfected?
normal display

### What is actually happy?
Style is abnormal.

| ENVIRONMENT | Info |
| --- | --- | |
| NG-Zorro-ATD | 14.1.1 |
| Browser | 360 Speed ​​browser 13.5.2 |

---
Angular 13.2.1 and NG-Zorro 13.x are normal. The new version shows abnormalities. Just after upgrading, I saw these two and quickly withdrew the update. In addition I don't know anything.

close: #7652 


## What is the new behavior?

Set `[nzLoop] = "false"` can prevent the carousel to go in a loop, for example when we are on the last item and swipe it right it should stay there, not going on the first item.

issue.title: fix wrong colgroup with  when using colspan
issue.body:
## PR Checklist
Please check if your PR fulfills the following requirements:

- [ ] Docs have been added / updated (for bug fixes / features)


## PR Type
What kind of change does this PR introduce?
The table component could not calculate the correct colgroup width when using colspan.
![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/31619017/193493837-66047bd7-1035-4880-861a-0e915595952a.png)
> the list of col width should be ['150px', '150px', '150px', '150px', '150px', '150px', '150px'], but now is [null, null, null, null].
> The table column width should add width to each column after splitting, so there should be 7 cols here. Due to logic problems, the wrong column width array is used here, and colspan is ignored

### Reproduction link

无

执行官网上的demo例子能正常编译通过，ng g ng-zorro-antd:code-editor-config <name>

使用官网提供的”Code Editor代码编辑器”组件，ng serve命令提示如下错误Error: node_modules/ng-zorro-antd/code-editor/typings.d.ts:10:9 - error TS2687: All declarations of 'MonacoEnvironment' must have identical modifiers.

"ng-zorro-antd": "^14.0.0"
@angular/core": "^14.2.0",
 "monaco-editor": "^0.34.0",

| Environment | Info |
|---|---|
| ng-zorro-antd | 14.0.0 |
| Browser | chrome |

issue.title: Why doesn't nz-input-number use type number
issue.body:
### Discussed in https://github.com/NG-ZORRO/ng-zorro-antd/discussions/7655
Originally posted by **saif317** September 30, 2022 in the input-number.component.ts file, this is how the input element is defined: ```
``` the type of the input element is not defined so it's defaulting to text, this allows the user to input non-numeric characters into the field, ng zorro handles that by removing non-numeric characters from the field, but why not use the default behavior of not allowing the user to input non-numeric character at all. any specific reason why the component was designed this way?

issue.title: fix(module:table): fix vertical scroll bar in table header and wrong listOfColWidth caused by th width colspan
issue.body:
## PR Checklist
Please check if your PR fulfills the following requirements:

- [x] The commit message follows our guidelines: https://github.com/NG-ZORRO/ng-zorro-antd/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md#commit
- [x] Tests for the changes have been added (for bug fixes / features)
- [ ] Docs have been added / updated (for bug fixes / features)


## PR Type
What kind of change does this PR introduce?

<!-- Please check the one that applies to this PR using "x". -->
```
[x] Bugfix
[ ] Feature
[ ] Code style update (formatting, local variables)
[ ] Refactoring (no functional changes, no api changes)
[ ] Build related changes
[ ] CI related changes
[ ] Documentation content changes
[ ] Application (the showcase website) / infrastructure changes
[ ] Other... Please describe:
```

## What is the current behavior?
In the past, if there was a header grouping, the table could not calculate the correct column width;
![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/31619017/193493837-66047bd7-1035-4880-861a-0e915595952a.png)
> the listOfColWidth should be ['150px', '150px', '150px', '150px', '150px', '150px', '150px'], but now is [null, null, null, null].

The table component of ng-zorro used to display a vertical scroll bar in the header, and modified its scroll bar style under webkit to achieve a similar display effect to Ant Design React, but this implementation uses styles that are only valid under webkit, Not compatible with firefox.

Issue Number: #7656 


## What is the new behavior?

After this modification, when the table has vertical scrolling, the header will add a scroll bar cell with the same width as the scroll bar of the table body in the last column of the first row and the last column of the table header like Ant Design React. If the column is fixed on the right, then this column is also fixed at the same time, and the corresponding right style is set for the other fixed columns on the right.

## Does this PR introduce a breaking change?
```
[ ] Yes
[x] No
```

## Other information
no

issue.title: DatePicker日期选择框 默认赋值还是不能及时清除（版本延续BUG）
issue.body:
### Reproduction link
[https://angular-lhdpad.stackblitz.io](https://angular-lhdpad.stackblitz.io)

### Steps to reproduce
初始化赋值，首次清除，不能及时实时清除掉，需要点开面板或片刻后。

### What is expected?
实时清除

### What is actually happening?
不能实时清除。

| Environment | Info |
|---|---|
| ng-zorro-antd | 14.0.0 |
| Browser | chrome |

---
每个版本这个问题都会出现,以下问题某种情况下会出现，有些复现不出来，奇怪。。
* 多选框 某种情况下，点击方框无法触发（只有光标点击以外方可变更），只能点击文字。
* 骨架屏 嵌套内容，部分情况内容会横向x 溢出，影响布局。
* 新版本14.x 点击菜单出现警告：Warning: The animation trigger "collapseMotion" is attempting to animate the following not animatable properties: overflow(to check the list of all animatable properties ...<!-- generated by ng-zorro-issue-helper. DO NOT REMOVE -->

issue.title: fix(module:tabs): fix selected index not update if new tab added after navigated
issue.body:
## PR Checklist
Please check if your PR fulfills the following requirements:

- [x] The commit message follows our guidelines: https://github.com/NG-ZORRO/ng-zorro-antd/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md#commit
- [x] Tests for the changes have been added (for bug fixes / features)
- [ ] Docs have been added / updated (for bug fixes / features)


## PR Type
What kind of change does this PR introduce?

<!-- Please check the one that applies to this PR using "x". -->
```
[x] Bugfix
[ ] Feature
[ ] Code style update (formatting, local variables)
[ ] Refactoring (no functional changes, no api changes)
[ ] Build related changes
[ ] CI related changes
[ ] Documentation content changes
[ ] Application (the showcase website) / infrastructure changes
[ ] Other... Please describe:
```

## What is the current behavior?
navigate with `await router.navigate(...)` to a new position and add update tabs bounded to the `nz-tab`, active tab not updated

Issue Number: N/A


## What is the new behavior?
navigate with `await router.navigate(...)` to a new position and add update tabs bounded to the `nz-tab`, active tab will be updated

## Does this PR introduce a breaking change?
```
[ ] Yes
[x] No
```

## Other information
The example above may look meaningless, however, there is a condition that a link tab is guarded by a feature flag, and so the tab can only be added after the route navigated, in this case, selected tab won't update properly

[ ] Application (the showcase website) / infrastructure changes
[ ] Other... Please describe:
```

## What is the current behavior?
<!-- Please describe the current behavior that you are modifying, or link to a relevant issue. -->

Issue Number: N/A

- `NzDrawerService` is provided at the `NzDrawerServiceModule`, this results in the inability to enjoy the benefits of tree shaking.

## What is the new behavior?

- `NzDrawerService` is now provided at the root, this will remove unused services using tree-shaking.

- [x] Docs have been added / updated (for bug fixes / features)


## PR Type
What kind of change does this PR introduce?

<!-- Please check the one that applies to this PR using "x". -->
```
[ ] Bugfix
[x] Feature
[ ] Code style update (formatting, local variables)
[ ] Refactoring (no functional changes, no api changes)
[ ] Build related changes
[ ] CI related changes
[ ] Documentation content changes
[ ] Application (the showcase website) / infrastructure changes
[ ] Other... Please describe:
```

## What is the current behavior?
<!-- Please describe the current behavior that you are modifying, or link to a relevant issue. -->

Issue Number: N/A

- `NzContextMenuService` is provided at the `NzContextMenuServiceModule`, this results in the inability to enjoy the benefits of tree shaking.
- `NzContextMenuService#create()` return `void`，developer cannot listen to view destroy event.

## What is the new behavior?

- `NzContextMenuService` is now provided at the root, this will remove unused services using tree-shaking.
- `NzContextMenuService#create()` will now return `EmbeddedViewRef`, developers can listen to view destroy event through `EmbeddedViewRef#onDestroy()`.

## Does this PR introduce a breaking change?
```
[ ] Yes
[x] No
```

issue.title: fix(list): specify template ref context on input to match instantiation
issue.body:
## PR Checklist
Please check if your PR fulfills the following requirements:

- [ ] The commit message follows our guidelines: https://github.com/NG-ZORRO/ng-zorro-antd/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md#commit
- [ ] Tests for the changes have been added (for bug fixes / features)
- [ ] Docs have been added / updated (for bug fixes / features)


## PR Type
What kind of change does this PR introduce?

<!-- Please check the one that applies to this PR using "x". -->
```
[x] Bugfix
[ ] Feature
[ ] Code style update (formatting, local variables)
[ ] Refactoring (no functional changes, no api changes)
[ ] Build related changes
[ ] CI related changes
[ ] Documentation content changes
[ ] Application (the showcase website) / infrastructure changes
[ ] Other... Please describe:
```

## What is the current behavior?
<!-- Please describe the current behavior that you are modifying, or link to a relevant issue. -->
Currently input `nzRenderItem` on NzList component is defined as `TemplateRef<void>` but it is instantiated with a context.

It works in current version to pass in a template, which relies on a provided context. Unfortunately template refs and their context are not type checked by Angular. So you can pass in a TemplateRef with context even if a TemplateRef without context is expected by the input. And ng-zorro can provide a context during the instantiation even if the TemplateRef is specified without context.

Issue Number: N/A


## What is the new behavior?

Input `nzRenderItem` on NzList component is now defined as `TemplateRef<{ $implicit: NzSafeAny, index: number}>`, the same context type as the template is providing.

## Does this PR introduce a breaking change?
```
[ ] Yes
[x] No
```

<!-- If this PR contains a breaking change, please describe the impact and migration path for existing applications below. -->


## Other information

issue.title: 希望继承自NzTooltipBaseDirective的气泡提供一个全局销毁接口
issue.body:
## What problem does this feature solve?
路由复用的时候(比如alain的路由复用标签)，如果如果在tooltip/popover打开的情况下，触发了跳转页面，这个时候tooltip的宿主元素被缓存了，tooltip却没有关闭，就会导致跳转了页面，上一个页面的tooltip还停留在页面上

## What does the proposed API look like?
如果可以像NzModalService.closeAll()那样，那就只需要监听router.events就可以全局的解决这个问题了。<!-- generated by ng-zorro-issue-helper. DO NOT REMOVE -->

comment.body:
Translation of this issue:
---
## Hope to inherit a global destruction interface from NZTooltipbaseDirective

## What PROBLEM DOES This Feature Solve?
When reuse of routes (such as Alain's routing label), if the jump page is triggered when the ToolTip/Popover is opened, the host element of Tooltip is cached at this time, but Tooltip is not closed, which will lead Turn to the page, the Tooltip on the previous page is still on the page

## What does the proposed api look like?
If it can be like nzmodalService.closeall (), you only need to monitor Router.events to solve this problem global.

issue.title: 希望给Message全局提示加上一个手动关闭的按钮
issue.body:
## What problem does this feature solve?
在查看错误信息的时候，需要长时间的观看，增加一个关闭按钮就能够看完信息后手动关闭

## What does the proposed API look like?
showClose<!-- generated by ng-zorro-issue-helper. DO NOT REMOVE -->

comment.body:
Translation of this issue:
---
## Hope to add a manual closure button to the MESSAGE global prompt

## What PROBLEM DOES This Feature Solve?
When viewing the error message, you need to watch it for a long time. Add a closing button to read it manually after reading the information

## What does the proposed api look like?
showclose

issue.title: 希望NzImagePreviewOptions 增加自定义样式支持
issue.body:
## What problem does this feature solve?
NzImagePreview 有时我们不想全屏预览图片，希望能左边停靠或右边停靠预览图片，预览组件宽度可以自定义。

## What does the proposed API look like?
希望可以在NzImagePreviewOptions 增加自定义样式支持，或增加左/右停靠和预览组件宽度自定义配置。<!-- generated by ng-zorro-issue-helper. DO NOT REMOVE -->

comment.body:
Translation of this issue:
---
## Hope NZIMAGEPREVIEPTIONS will add custom style support

## What PROBLEM DOES This Feature Solve?
NZIMAGEPREVIEW sometimes does not want to preview the picture in full screen. I hope that the left side can be stopped or on the right. The width of the preview component can be customized.

## What does the proposed api look like?
It is hoped that you can add custom style support at NZIMAGEPREVIEPTIONS, or add left/right stop and preview component width custom configuration.

issue.title: Switch开关、Modal对话框在360极速浏览器样式异常
issue.body:
### Reproduction link
[https://angular-qpezqw.stackblitz.io](https://angular-qpezqw.stackblitz.io)

### Steps to reproduce
Switch开关、Modal对话框在360极速浏览器样式异常，
switch开关仅显示个颜色块
modal弹出在浏览器左上角

### What is expected?
正常显示

### What is actually happening?
样式异常。

| Environment | Info |
|---|---|
| ng-zorro-antd | 14.1.1 |
| Browser | 360极速浏览器13.5.2 |

---
Angular 13.2.1 与 ng-zorro 13.x 显示正常，新版显示异常，刚升级，就看到这两个，赶紧撤回更新了；另外我一个项目存在本地编辑，页面不断刷新N多次后才停止，不晓得什么问题。<!-- generated by ng-zorro-issue-helper. DO NOT REMOVE -->

comment.body:
Translation of this issue:
---

### REPRODUCTION LINK
[https://angular-qpezqw.stackblitz.io] (https://angular-qpezqw.stackblitz.io))

### STEPS To Reproduce
The Switch switch, the MODAL dialog box is abnormal in the 360 ​​speed browser style,
Switch switch only shows a color block
Modal pops up in the upper left corner of the browser

normal display

### What is actually happy?
Style is abnormal.

| ENVIRONMENT | Info |
| --- | --- | |
| NG-Zorro-ATD | 14.1.1 |
| Browser | 360 Speed ​​browser 13.5.2 |

---
Angular 13.2.1 and NG-Zorro 13.x are normal. The new version shows abnormalities. Just after upgrading, I saw these two and quickly withdrew the update. In addition I don't know anything.

issue.title: fix wrong colgroup with  when using colspan
issue.body:

- [ ] Docs have been added / updated (for bug fixes / features)


## PR Type
What kind of change does this PR introduce?
The table component could not calculate the correct colgroup width when using colspan.
![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/31619017/193493837-66047bd7-1035-4880-861a-0e915595952a.png)
> the list of col width should be ['150px', '150px', '150px', '150px', '150px', '150px', '150px'], but now is [null, null, null, null].
> The table column width should add width to each column after splitting, so there should be 7 cols here. Due to logic problems, the wrong column width array is used here, and colspan is ignored

| Browser | chrome |

issue.title: Why doesn't nz-input-number use type number
issue.body:
### Discussed in https://github.com/NG-ZORRO/ng-zorro-antd/discussions/7655
Originally posted by **saif317** September 30, 2022 in the input-number.component.ts file, this is how the input element is defined: ```
``` the type of the input element is not defined so it's defaulting to text, this allows the user to input non-numeric characters into the field, ng zorro handles that by removing non-numeric characters from the field, but why not use the default behavior of not allowing the user to input non-numeric character at all. any specific reason why the component was designed this way?

issue.title: fix(module:table): fix vertical scroll bar in table header and wrong listOfColWidth caused by th width colspan
issue.body:
## PR Checklist
Please check if your PR fulfills the following requirements:

- [x] The commit message follows our guidelines: https://github.com/NG-ZORRO/ng-zorro-antd/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md#commit
- [x] Tests for the changes have been added (for bug fixes / features)
- [ ] Docs have been added / updated (for bug fixes / features)


## PR Type
What kind of change does this PR introduce?

<!-- Please check the one that applies to this PR using "x". -->
```
[x] Bugfix
[ ] Feature
[ ] Code style update (formatting, local variables)
[ ] Refactoring (no functional changes, no api changes)
[ ] Build related changes
[ ] CI related changes
[ ] Documentation content changes
[ ] Application (the showcase website) / infrastructure changes
[ ] Other... Please describe:
```

## What is the current behavior?
In the past, if there was a header grouping, the table could not calculate the correct column width;
![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/31619017/193493837-66047bd7-1035-4880-861a-0e915595952a.png)
> the listOfColWidth should be ['150px', '150px', '150px', '150px', '150px', '150px', '150px'], but now is [null, null, null, null].

The table component of ng-zorro used to display a vertical scroll bar in the header, and modified its scroll bar style under webkit to achieve a similar display effect to Ant Design React, but this implementation uses styles that are only valid under webkit, Not compatible with firefox.

Issue Number: #7656 


## What is the new behavior?

After this modification, when the table has vertical scrolling, the header will add a scroll bar cell with the same width as the scroll bar of the table body in the last column of the first row and the last column of the table header like Ant Design React. If the column is fixed on the right, then this column is also fixed at the same time, and the corresponding right style is set for the other fixed columns on the right.

## Does this PR introduce a breaking change?
```
[ ] Yes
[x] No
```

## Other information
no

issue.body:
### Reproduction link

### Steps to reproduce

### What is expected?

### Reproduction link
[https://angular-lhdpad.stackblitz.io](https://angular-lhdpad.stackblitz.io)

### Steps to reproduce
初始化赋值，首次清除，不能及时实时清除掉，需要点开面板或片刻后。

### What is expected?
实时清除

### What is actually happening?
不能实时清除。

| Environment | Info |
|---|---|
| ng-zorro-antd | 14.0.0 |
| Browser | chrome |

---
每个版本这个问题都会出现,以下问题某种情况下会出现，有些复现不出来，奇怪。。
* 多选框 某种情况下，点击方框无法触发（只有光标点击以外方可变更），只能点击文字。
* 骨架屏 嵌套内容，部分情况内容会横向x 溢出，影响布局。
* 新版本14.x 点击菜单出现警告：Warning: The animation trigger "collapseMotion" is attempting to animate the following not animatable properties: overflow(to check the list of all animatable properties ...<!-- generated by ng-zorro-issue-helper. DO NOT REMOVE -->

issue.title: fix(module:tabs): fix selected index not update if new tab added after navigated
issue.body:
## PR Checklist
Please check if your PR fulfills the following requirements:

- [x] The commit message follows our guidelines: https://github.com/NG-ZORRO/ng-zorro-antd/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md#commit

<!-- Please check the one that applies to this PR using "x". -->
```
[x] Bugfix
[ ] Feature
[ ] Code style update (formatting, local variables)
[ ] Refactoring (no functional changes, no api changes)
[ ] Build related changes
[ ] CI related changes
[ ] Documentation content changes
[ ] Application (the showcase website) / infrastructure changes
[ ] Other... Please describe:
```

## What is the current behavior?
navigate with `await router.navigate(...)` to a new position and add update tabs bounded to the `nz-tab`, active tab not updated

Issue Number: N/A


## What is the new behavior?
navigate with `await router.navigate(...)` to a new position and add update tabs bounded to the `nz-tab`, active tab will be updated

## Does this PR introduce a breaking change?
```
[ ] Yes
[x] No
```

## Other information
The example above may look meaningless, however, there is a condition that a link tab is guarded by a feature flag, and so the tab can only be added after the route navigated, in this case, selected tab won't update properly
